arts.ttl: Can Nicolas Jackson play against Chelsea for Bayern Munich?
arts.sum: Chelsea begin their Champions League campaign with a tough trip to face Bayern Munich on Wednesday night. The West Londoners travel to the Allianz Arena, the venue and opposition of their maiden Champions League triumph in 2012.
